reviewText: Worked very well with my elementary Sunday school class.  I plan to purchase the others in the series.  It gives just enough info to keep their interest and is short enough to fit within the time allotment.  It is well done and my husband plans to use it with his adult class as well.
Graphics, historical accurateness and narration are essential for Holy Land videos. This video hits it out of the park. Best of the series on the Holy Lands.
Nothing new  Little about Moses  Fairly Lame
Shalom! I rented this at the library, amazing! Its hard to to find truthful documentaries like this gem, make some more please. Id like to see the israelites.
